name: Faceless
description:
In a city where many people go missing.

The woman who was dating the main character suddenly disappears.

Amidst his sadness and anxiety, he is attacked by a mysterious man who suddenly appears...


"Faceless" is a short horror game.

The actions you take to advance the game are basically not explicit. Please try various things.

If you notice something unusual in your room, find the cause. (Not like The Exit 8)

Sometimes you need to run and hide.

There are 2 endings.

Option

If the frame rate of the game is not comfortable, please change the settings from the options.
・Texture Quality→Low
・Shadow Quality→High or middle
・Shading→Low
・Anti-Alising→Low
I think changing it as above will improve it.
Please be careful not to lower the "shadow quality" too much. Some stages can be too bright.
